articles.title: 'We will vote but not with our hearts': Inside the election staged by Myanmar's military rulers
articles.description: This is the first election since the army's coup in early 2021 - and it is being widely condemned as a sham.

articles.title: How reality crushed Ÿnsect, the French startup that had raised over $600M for insect farming
articles.description: French insect farming company Ÿnsect was recently placed into judicial liquidation for insolvency, despite raising over $600 million.

articles.title: Matheson: This Oilers forward is heading back to Europe. What happened?
articles.description: When last we saw David Tomasek at Rogers Place, it wasn’t on the ice. He was on the big screen, wishing one and all a Happy Christmas season. articles.title: Kìwekì Point damage caused by school bus driving along pathway
articles.description: The NCC confirmed that a rogue school bus driver drove on the path illegally causing damage to the wooden panels of the structure at Kìwekì Point.
